caption.p: Compounds from Oxalis pes-caprae [ 37, 38, 39, 40]. ( E)-3-methoxyphenyl 3,4,5-trimethoxycinnamate 13, ( E)-3-hydroxyphenyl 3,4,5-trimethoxycinnamate 14, 3-hydroxyphenyl sinapate 15, ( E)-2-hydroxyethyl 3,4,5-trimethoxycinnamate 16, 2-hydroxyethyl sinapate 17, ( E)-2-acetylethyl 3,4,5-trimethoxycinnamate 18, 2-hydroxyethyl caffeate 19, 4′-acetylphenyl 4-hydroxycinnamate 20, 4′-acetylphenyl 4-hydroxycinnamate 21, 4′-acetylphenyl 4- O-methylsinapate 22, 3′-acetylphenyl 4-methylsinapate 23, 4′-(1-hydroxyethyl)phenyl sinapate 24, 3′-(1-hydroxyethyl)phenyl 4-methylsinapate 25, ( E)-3-methoxyphenyl 4-hydroxycinnamate 26, 2-methoxyphenyl 3-phenylpropanoate 27, 2-hydroxyethyl 3-phenylpropanoate 28, ( E)-4-[4-(2-carboxyethenyl)phenoxy]benzoic acid 29, 4,4′-[1,1′-oxybis(ethane-1,1-diyl)]diphenol 30, loliolide 31, and (E)-4-(1-(4-(1-hydroxyethyl)phenoxy)ethyl)phenyl 3,4,5-trimethoxycinnamate 32.
